properties.entry: SELECT /* com.kh.member.model.dao.MemberDao#loginMember() */ USER_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , EMAIL , MEM_PIC , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS ='Y' AND MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?

INSERT /* com.kh.member.model.dao.MemberDao#insertMember() */ INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , EMAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ?
)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS='N' WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT M.USER_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , EMAIL , MEM_PIC , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_REP_COUNT , M.STATUS , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE USER_NO = M.USER_NO) BOARD_COUNT FROM MEMBER M WHERE NOT USER_NO=1

SELECT M.USER_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , EMAIL , MEM_PIC , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_REP_COUNT , M.STATUS , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE USER_NO = M.USER_NO) BOARD_COUNT FROM MEMBER M WHERE NOT USER_NO=1 AND M.STATUS = 'B'

SELECT M.USER_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , EMAIL , MEM_PIC , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_REP_COUNT , M.STATUS , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE USER_NO = M.USER_NO) BOARD_COUNT FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.USER_NO = ?
UPDATE /* com.kh.member.model.dao.MemberDao#selectMember() */ MEMBER SET MEM_PWD= ? , MEM_NAME= ? , EMAIL = ? , MEM_PIC = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , EMAIL , MEM_PIC , ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.USER_NO , M.MEM_ID , M.MEM_NAME , M.MEM_PIC , B.BOARD_TITLE , DECODE(B.BOARD_TYPE, 1, '일상', '후기') BOARD_CATEGORY , B.BOARD_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') CREATE_DATE , B.BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.USER_NO = ?
